name: Crocheted Bag with resin handles
description:
This unique bag is crocheted using upcycled cotton jersey and a contrasting yarn to add detail. It has resin handles and measures 25cm x 20cm (approx)
It is fully lined with floral fabric.

name: Beach Bag
description:
A beautiful beach bag made using Hoopla Yarn, a super chunky, super strong yarn that is 100% cotton jersey. Hoopla Yarn is made from the selvedge edges of T-shirt material and is an upcycled product that would otherwise be put in landfill.
This bag has two thick straps, making it completely hands free. This bag can be made in any three or four colours - just pick your favourites from the site.
Please use the Contact Us page to let us know what colours you would like your bag in.
Can be lined, please specify when you order.
Also available as a crochet kit for those of you who want to make their own.

name: Shoulder Bag with Clasp
description:
A beautiful bag made using Hoopla Yarn, a super chunky, super strong yarn that is 100% cotton jersey. Hoopla Yarn is made from the selvedge edges of T-shirt material and is an upcycled product that would otherwise be put in landfill.
 This bag has two straps, perfect for wearing on your shoulder or just holding. There is also a smaller strap that fixes with a large button, acting as a clasp to help close the bag and give you more peace of mind. This bag can be made in any colour - just pick your favourites from the site.
 Please use the Contact Us page to let us know what colours you would like your bag in.

name: Large one-strap Beach Bag
description:
A beautiful beach bag made using Hoopla Yarn, a super chunky, super strong yarn that is 100% cotton jersey. Hoopla Yarn is made from the selvedge edges of T-shirt material and is an upcycled product that would otherwise be put in landfill.
This bag has one long, thick strap, making it completely hands free. This bag can be made in any three or four colours - just pick your favourites from the site.
Please use the Contact Us page to let us know what colours you would like your bag in.

name: Cabled Hoopla Rug
description:
This is a made to order item and so will take some time to make. We will send you an estimation of dispatch when you purchase this item. 
This rug can be made in any colour of Hoopla that we have in stock, and so please choose from the colours in our shop and leave us a note on the order form.
The rug is approximately 65x45cm and has two bulky cables running down it's length. It is perfect as a bath mat or children's rug, as Hoopla is a very durable yarn and washable at 30 degrees centigrade. The yarn itself is mainly cotton with a small percentage of lycra - it contains no wool. 
If you would like any more information or samples of yarn, please contact us. 
If you prefer to do it yourself, we have a variety of kits for varying abilities of knitting and crocheting. These come with all you need to complete this or another item of your choice.
Shown in Keylime Green.
